Text: Thanks heaps! Particularly nostalgic for an Aussie living in the far, far north (we're talking Santa territory)... takes me back to '89, or was it '90?. This is a nice album, and I have Tabaran, the CD they made in New Guinea. Would love a decent copy of Little Desert, if anyone happens to have it... my 20 year old cassette has seen better days! Let me know if anyone needs Tabaran!   80)
